nodes.text: This operator worked for Bakura Orbital Control in 28 ABY. His shifts coordinated with Jagged Fel, commander of the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances starfighter unit Twin Suns Squadron, when an out of control YT-series freighter, the Jaunty Cavalier threatened to impact the Pride of Selonia, a Galactic Alliance frigate. He recognized the Jaunty Cavalier immediately, as he was owed a sum of credits by the Jaunty Cavalier's captain, Rufarr.
